The Progressive, Flexible and Friendly Full Stack NodeJS Framework

Documentation Source Code open in new window

Progressive

Istanbul is innovative in a way that won't bother you. All packages that NodeJS stabilizes are our development goal!

Flexible

Istanbul is as much as you want. Istanbul provides a suitable infrastructure for all scales, from the smallest to the largest.

Friendly

Istanbul was developed by developers, not aliens. Therefore, it is easier and less troublesome to reach everything you may need.

Life is too short to think about everything. We thought for you once, now the rest is as effortless as the codes below!

import { createApp } from "@istanbul/app"
import { createHttpServer, createRouter } from "@istanbul/http"

const app = createApp()
app.register(createHttpServer())

const router = createRouter()
router.get("view", (req, res, next) => {
    res.success("Welcome to IstanbulJS!")
})

app.start()

import { createApp } from "@istanbul/app"
import { createWsApp } from "@istanbul/ws"

const app = createApp()
const ws = createWsApp()
app.register(ws)

ws.listen("view", (socket, req, res) => {
    res.reply("Welcome to IstanbulJS!")
})

app.start()

Although the codes are short, there is that much you can do. Start now.
